title: Number Plate Recognition
description: This project focuses on the development of a robust number plate detection system using computer vision and machine learning techniques. It utilizes OpenCV for image processing and applies various algorithms to accurately detect and recognize license plates from vehicle images. The system is designed to be efficient and scalable, making it suitable for real-time applications such as traffic monitoring and automated toll collection.

title: NoQ Job Portal
description: NoQ is a tool which allows for both employers and students to skip the hassle seen in modern day career fairs, while effectively pairing up students with employees based on various factors.

title: Hospital Management System
description: This project focuses on creating a comprehensive Hospital Management System that streamlines patient care, appointment scheduling, medical records management, and billing processes. It involves designing an intuitive user interface for both patients and healthcare providers, developing a secure database to store sensitive information, and implementing analytics for better healthcare outcomes.

title: Geographic Analysis and Pathfinding System
description: This project aims to develop a sophisticated Geographic Analysis and Pathfinding System that leverages advanced GIS technologies and pathfinding algorithms to facilitate efficient route planning and geographical data analysis. It focuses on creating a user-friendly interface for users to interact with complex geographic data, perform spatial analysis, and find optimal paths for various applications such as urban planning, emergency response, and outdoor navigation.

title: Suicide Analyzer
description: This is a web application, uses a map to demonstrate the number suicides committed around the globe, according to a dataset provided by the WHO.

title: QuantumNetScript-Architectural-Augmentation
description: QuantumNetScript-Architectural-Augmentation is a network automation toolkit designed to enhance and automate various aspects of network architecture. It includes the DynamicLoadBalancer class for optimal traffic distribution, the LAMPStackAutomation class for managing LAMP stack lifecycles, and the CDNOptimizationScript class for optimizing Content Delivery Networks. This toolkit aims to streamline network operations, ensuring high availability and performance.
